p: Allele frequencies were calculated using Zhivotovsky's Bayesian method ( 1999) assuming Hardy–Weinberg equilibrium (R‐functions to carry out population genetic analyses are available as Files S10 and S11). Allele frequency estimates for globally polymorphic loci (0.05 ≤ q ≤ 0.95) were used to calculate gene diversity (an unbiased estimate of the expected heterozygosity) for climatic and soil‐depth subpopulations at BCCIL for each study species (Lynch & Milligan, 1994; Text S2).
